p: where, A blank represents the absorbance corresponding to the control (comprising all reagents except the test compound) and A sample refers to the absorbance corresponding to the test compound. The EC 50 value (Î¼g mL -1) refers to the effective concentration at which DPPH radicals are removed by 50.00%. This was achieved through interpolation and utilizing linear regression analysis. The BHT was applied as a control.
